translations: 声名狼藉的；无耻的；邪恶的；不名誉的

sentences.sentence: The other half of the name represents another ingredient, less infamous, perhaps, but also strangely potent: the kola nut.
sentences.translation: 名字的另一半代表了另一种成分，也许不那么臭名昭著，但也有奇特的效力：可乐果。

sentences.sentence: The ship crashed into the infamous Sker Point rocks and broke into three pieces.
sentences.translation: 这艘船撞上了恶名远扬的斯戈尔尖岬暗礁群，断为三截。

sentences.sentence: During the rest of the time, I got a title "the Infamous Perjurer Twain" on this paper.
sentences.translation: 剩下的时间里，我在报纸上找到了一个叫《臭名昭著的伪证者吐温》的标题。
